# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product holds significant value for you at $150, and we believe it's an excellent investment for you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $140. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
